summary: Jarod reunites with two old friends and unleashes some powerful Centre revelations. Also Jarod and Miss Parker learn more about their pasts.
cast: Michael T. Weiss|Andrea Parker|Patrick Bauchau|Jon Gries|Harve Presnell|Richard Marcus|James Denton|Tyler Christopher|Peter Outerbridge|Cynthia Dale|Derwin Jordan|Yannick Bisson|May Charters|Paul Dillon|Chris Khalil|Mike Massa|Anthony Poser|Louis A. Rivera|Stone Van Gorder|Frank Morehead
title: The Pretender 2001
